column1: #Text=Zuko says : " What is the meaning of this mutiny ?
#Text=I assure you , it is a matter of utmost importance , Prince Zuko .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Is it something to do with the Avatar ?
#Text=It seems , I - - I have lost my lotus tile .
#Text=" Iroh says : " For my Pai Sho game .
#Text=Most people think the lotus tile insignificant , but it is essential for the unusual strategy that I employ .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You 've changed our course for a stupid lotus tile ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " See , you , like most people , underestimate it 's value .
#Text=Just give me ten minutes to check the merchants at this port of call .
#Text=Hopefully , they will have the lotus tile in stock and I can get on with my life .
#Text=I 'm lucky to have such an understanding nephew .
